articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Kasper Schmeichel had very little to do against Kilmarnock on Sunday, however, the most notable aspect of his play was his distribution.  On four occasions he swept an early ball to a Celtic player around the halfway line. This ability is the new normal at elite level in England and is why outstanding keepers, like [...]

articles.description: JAMES McCARTHY has been removed from the Celtic first-team picture – quite literally. The 33-year-old midfielder is nowhere to be seen in the official list of players with his image being removed over the past week. The transfermarkt website shows McCarthy’s current club as Celtic and states he is under contract until May 31 2025. However, [...]

articles.description: CALLUM McGREGOR is convinced Kasper Schmeichel will be a roaring success at Celtic. But captain McGregor admitted he had already seen AND heard enough to believe Schmeichel will be a big noise at Parkhead. The [...]

articles.description: JOHN ‘YOGI’ HUGHES played in five of Celtic’s eight ties during their great adventure that took Jock Stein’s team to the European Cup Final against Inter Milan in Lisbon on the unforgettable date of May 25 1967. The non-appearance of the iconic Hoops forward has been the subject of conjecture ever since. The goalscoring winger [...]

Laxalt answered the SOS to offer competition to Greg [...]

articles.description: Our two compensations are that Matt O’Riley is behaving impeccably despite mounting speculation about his future and Celtic have him under contract for another three years.  The Sun’s assertion that Brighton have joined Southampton and Atalanta in the race to sign Matt raises the potential ticket price, should the player move. articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Celtic opened the season on Sunday with an impressive showing against Kilmarnock at Celtic Park. Celtic dominated the game against a team who beat us last season in both League and League Cup. 4-0 on the day and it could have been more.  Tickets for Celtic v Hibernian in the League Cup are on sale […]
The post League Cup Tickets appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: League Cup Tickets

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Match day and the start of a new season for Celtic Fans has dawned. The summer of transfer speculation will still continue but it will be in the back of the mind for most fans today. Foremost in the fans mind will be a 3 points start to the season against Kilmarnock. You know when […]
The post CELTIC ARE BACK! appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: CELTIC ARE BACK!

articles.description:
Jim Craig done it all as a Celtic player. Jim and his team mates are the most famous Celtic players in Celtic’s long history after that famous win in Lisbon in 1967. On Sunday Jim Craig will unfurl the league flag at Paradise and get the hero’s welcome once again from the Celtic support. After […]
